predictions.article: USDA Prepares to Protect Farmers in a Trade War
predictions.prediction: The implementation of the Emergency Commodity Assistance Program (ECAP) will lead to a stabilization or slight increase in farm income levels in the U.S. within the next month, as the $10 billion in direct economic assistance is distributed to farmers.

predictions.article: US Farmers Face Higher Costs, Fewer Markets from Tariffs
predictions.prediction: The imposition of tariffs will result in a 10% increase in the cost of agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and machinery for U.S. farmers within the next m
